title: AI promises a $142 billion boost to Australia's economy: How can migrants share in the success?
description: Artificial intelligence could add $142 billion to Australia’s economy, but a new KPMG report reveals rising worker anxiety about automation. This story explores what AI means for migrant workers, the risks, the opportunities, and how they can be part of Australia’s success story.
content: A new report suggests that artificial Intelligence could boost Australia’s economy by $142 billion a year, but a recent KPMG report shows growing anxiety among workers about losing control to technology. What does this AI-driven shift mean for migran... [1103 chars]

title: EM Stocks Rise Every Month This Year, First Time Since 1993
description: The emerging-market equity benchmark is set for a 10th straight monthly gain in October, as an artificial-intelligence boom and a weaker dollar drive capital inflows.

title: VTU opens Centre of Excellence in AI, digital classrooms and library in Kalaburagi
description: Sanjeev Kubakaddi, former executive council member of VTU and founder of SKMED Innovations Private Limited, who was the chief guest, said the new Centre of Excellence would transform the education landscape by integrating Artificial Intelligence into skill development.
content: Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU), Belagavi, inaugurated a Centre of Excellence (CoE) in Artificial Intelligence-based Skilling and Assessment, along with digital classrooms and a digital library at its regional centre in Kalaburagi on Octo... [1888 chars]

title: AI Frustration Could Be Costing UK Retailers Billions, CEBR Says
description: British shoppers’ frustration with chatbots and other artificial intelligence features could be costing retailers billions of pounds, a study found.
content:

title: Xinhua Silk Road: Unleashing digital potential to unlock new vitality of liquor industry
description: BEIJING, Oct. 31, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Amid the wave of the digital economy, new-generation digital technologies such as cloud computing, big data, the Internet of Things, and artificial intelligence are rapidly developing and deeply integrating into the entire liquor industry chain, injecting new vitality into the development of this traditional sector.   Original link: https://en.imsilkroad.com/p/348121.html

title: Amazon shares soar 14% as cloud growth beats expectations
description: The online retailer benefited as businesses continue to spend relentlessly on artificial intelligence software development
content:
Amazon's cloud revenue rose at the fastest clip in nearly three years, helping the company forecast quarterly sales above estimates and driving its shares up 14% in after-market trading.
The company projected increased capital spending next year.

title: Google CEO Sundar Pichai expresses enthusiasm over AI deal with Reliance, highlights benefits for Jio users
description: Google and Reliance Jio are joining forces to boost Artificial Intelligence use across India. Eligible Jio customers will receive Google's AI Pro plan for free for 18 months. This includes advanced AI tools and significant cloud storage. The initiative aims to empower consumers, businesses, and developers. Reliance will also partner with Google Cloud for AI hardware.

title: AI, CT Curriculum To Be Introduced From Class 3 By 2026; CBSE Sets Up Expert Committee
description: Artificial Intelligence and Computational Thinking will be introduced in all schools from Class 3 starting 2026–27 under the Ministry of Education’s plan. The move aligns with NEP 2020 and aims to equip students with essential digital and analytical skills.
content:
Last Updated:October 31, 2025, 08:36 IST
The Education Ministry will introduce Artificial Intelligence and Computational Thinking from Grade 3 in schools starting 2026–27, aligning with NEP 2020 and NCF SE 2023.
